message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but $150 is really the lowest I can go right now.  I'm confident this product will be very valuable for you.
I'm still interested, but I really can't go above $110. Can you meet me at that price?
